item.title: I Bet U No One Knows!
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

Go into the server and change where the character files load and save too. Duh… Like…

characterfile = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./characters/"

Change it too like C:/Chars do the same for the load code.
